predicate.note: Frames file for 'presume' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: As it stands now , Congress presumes after the Reagan administration that the White House will take unconstitutional provisions in appropriations bills [*-1] lying down .

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: Company officials said [0] 22 workers were missing and presumed [*-1] dead .
